name: map-deckgl-aggregation
title: deck.gl Aggregation Layers
description: Data aggregation layers: Heatmap, Hexagon, Grid, Contour, ScreenGrid.

files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
  import { VLayerDeckglHeatmap } from '@geoql/v-maplibre';
  import type { HeatmapLayerProps } from '@deck.gl/aggregation-layers';

  export interface MapLayerHeatmapProps extends Partial<HeatmapLayerProps> {
    id: string;
    data: unknown[] | string;
  }

  const props = defineProps<MapLayerHeatmapProps>();
</script>

<template>
  <VLayerDeckglHeatmap v-bind="props"></VLayerDeckglHeatmap>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
  import { VLayerDeckglHexagon } from '@geoql/v-maplibre';
  import type { HexagonLayerProps } from '@deck.gl/aggregation-layers';
  import type { PickingInfo } from '@deck.gl/core';

  export interface MapLayerHexagonProps extends Partial<HexagonLayerProps> {
    id: string;
    data: unknown[] | string;
  }

  const props = defineProps<MapLayerHexagonProps>();

  const emit = defineEmits<{
    click: [info: PickingInfo];
    hover: [info: PickingInfo];
  }>();
</script>

<template>
  <VLayerDeckglHexagon
    v-bind="props"
    @click="(info) => emit('click', info)"
    @hover="(info) => emit('hover', info)"
  ></VLayerDeckglHexagon>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
  import { VLayerDeckglGrid } from '@geoql/v-maplibre';
  import type { GridLayerProps } from '@deck.gl/aggregation-layers';
  import type { PickingInfo } from '@deck.gl/core';

  export interface MapLayerGridProps extends Partial<GridLayerProps> {
    id: string;
    data: unknown[] | string;
  }

  const props = defineProps<MapLayerGridProps>();

  const emit = defineEmits<{
    click: [info: PickingInfo];
    hover: [info: PickingInfo];
  }>();
</script>

<template>
  <VLayerDeckglGrid
    v-bind="props"
    @click="(info) => emit('click', info)"
    @hover="(info) => emit('hover', info)"
  ></VLayerDeckglGrid>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
  import { VLayerDeckglContour } from '@geoql/v-maplibre';
  import type { ContourLayerProps } from '@deck.gl/aggregation-layers';

  export interface MapLayerContourProps extends Partial<ContourLayerProps> {
    id: string;
    data: unknown[] | string;
  }

  const props = defineProps<MapLayerContourProps>();
</script>

<template>
  <VLayerDeckglContour v-bind="props"></VLayerDeckglContour>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
  import { VLayerDeckglScreenGrid } from '@geoql/v-maplibre';
  import type { ScreenGridLayerProps } from '@deck.gl/aggregation-layers';

  export interface MapLayerScreenGridProps extends Partial<ScreenGridLayerProps> {
    id: string;
    data: unknown[] | string;
  }

  const props = defineProps<MapLayerScreenGridProps>();
</script>

<template>
  <VLayerDeckglScreenGrid v-bind="props"></VLayerDeckglScreenGrid>
</template>
